original_title: Alvin and the Chipmunks in Around the World with the Chipmunks
overview: - Maids in Japan. Alvin decides the Chipmunks need to change their image and signs them up for Kabuki lessons. Unfortunately Alvin's Japanese is a little rusty and the boys find themselves performing as geisha girls instead. - Alvie's Angels. Brittany, Jeanette and Eleanor travel the globe as fashion conscious detectives in search of a menacing jewel thief. - The Mystery of Seville Manor. While the Chipmunks tour merry old England, Alvin is sure he can prove he's related to royalty.
title: Alvin and the Chipmunks in Around the World with the Chipmunks
